name: Biz-A-Rama
short_description:
Biz-A-Rama is a business simulator that teaches how to run a business. Biz-A-Rama is FREE, Open-Source, and recommended for all business classes. This fun game simulates all aspects of business ownership. You can create and manage a business, force competitors into bankruptcy, and dominate your industry. You can even customize your business owner and business building. New items for your business will become available as the years go by in the game.


System Requirements:
   -Windows 7 or later.
   -.NET Framework 4.5

There may also be a mobile version released. Just check our website! We will also let oyu know here if there is a mobile version. Currently, there are no mobile or tablet versions.
summary: Create and manage your own business!
